name: Traffic Ramp
description:
Traffic Ramp

You had enough! Traffic Ramp is a fast paced quick to learn game. Play it for a few minutes, or smash through thousands of cars in one sitting!

You are an Auto Repair Shop owner, but business is bad. Smash cars so they repair them at your shop, and business will thrive again!

Control your truck with tilting, use the gas and brake pedals!

Complete missions to gain more coins every 6 hours! Upgrade your shop to attract customers and get BIG daily income Avoid the police and military!

Get new and faster trucks with unique abilities like rocket thrust, police immunity and time control!

Find the hidden easter eggs!
